{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-620 |revision=S/G1A |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358U |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358U |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=Vampik |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://dlink.ru/ru/products/5/2151.html Product page] (DIR-620/GA)
D-Link DIR-620 S/G1A (G1(BCM) VER.B) *[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?&showtopic=445383 ''DIR-620 S/G1A''] *[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=445383&st=3020#entry40717393 ''PCB DIR-620/G1'']
This device is presumably sold mainly (only?) in Russia and Ukraine.
Support firmware by [http://vampik.ru/2013/04/02/testovaya-versiya-proshivki-dlya-d-link-dir-620-rev-c1/ Vampik] FW: [http://vampik.ru/wl500g/rtn/5010/DIR620C1-3.0.5-r5010M.trx DIR620C1-3.0.5-r5010M] :Simple flash from web interface of D-Link stock firmware.
See also [[D-Link DIR-620]]..
==Images== <gallery caption="Internal"> File:DIR-620 C1 CPU.JPG|CPU File:DIR-620 C1 RAM.JPG|RAM File:DIR-620 C1 FLA.JPG|Flash </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
